author: _spacerabbit
content: Any idea what gas limit you would use to send eth to a smart contract wallet? 21000 failed

author: sky.cactus
content: It depends what, if anything the contract does on receipt.  You should be able to estimate how much it will use, or you could just let a big number and hope for the best.

author: aberkie
content: I request to have people consider upgrading their microphones and possibly cameras if you are on meetings/podcasts. I've been listening to great content from Vitalik and Justin Drake and generally other Ethereum related meetings and it is almost comical how bad the quality is. The information is so valuable to the community but the transmission is so poor.
